reviewText: This game is useful for anyone visiting the North of England or applying for a drivers licence. Be warned if applying for a drivers licence in the north, you might forget where the line between game and reallity is and start chatting jazz poetry at real people who don't care for that sort of thing. Enjoy adventures and isometric art? Want to know more about the Meat raffle"? Well worth a look!"

reviewText: Buy this game now. It is a thoroughly bizarre and utterly hilarious point and click adventure. I haven't had this dense laughs per minute in an adventure game for ages. You are a poet. You are in an absurd British beatnik microverse. It is brilliant.

reviewText: Great game!  Very surreal and atmospheric.  The artwork and humor are worth the purchase.

First Impressions Video:

https://youtu.be/ZxI-oJLiQyQ

Grimsfield is a strange game. It's all about some former detective trying to be an artist in a world run by comical government restrictions.

The aesthetics are simple, but oddly perfect for the game. There's just enough detail to know what's going on, but it still looks like a bland world, which is clearly what the devs were going for.

The dialogue options are amusing, to say the least. The various characters definitely fit their intended roles.

Overall, if you're interested in this game, go for it. It's small, but nicely made, and you won't regret devoting a few hours to it.
Well worth a play!! Had a good laugh and a very entertaining time, good game.
Thought-provoking, eerily beautiful, and poetic. Worth the $3.99 I payed for it.
Really great little game! Beautiful design, hilarious dialogue. The game is short and the gameplay is simple, but overall it's super entertaining and worth $3! Try it!
Left a smile on my face. Good humor.
This game is very original, funny and has a fun story to go with it. I would definitely recommend! :)
